<h2 align='center'>Javascript URL Resolver ‚ú®</h2>

<p align="center">
<a href="https://github.com/Inside4ndroid"><img title="Author" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Author-Inside4ndroid-purple.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=github"></a>
</p>
<br>

<p align="center">
<span style='font-size: 19px'>
A URL Resolver for embed host and websites. This will start off very small but will be a continued project and constantly updated with new hosts.
</span>
</p>
<br>

<h2 align='center'>Installation</h2>
<br>

```sh

# Clone the repo
$ git clone git clone https://github.com/Inside4ndroid/Url-Resolver.git

# Go to the repository
$ cd cd Url-Resolver

# Install packages
$ npm install

# Run the project
$ npm run dev

# To access API Open any browser/API Testing tool & move to the given URL
`http://your-ip-or-domain.com:3000?url=your-url-to-be-resolved`

```

<br>

---

<h2 align='center'>Supported Sites</h2>
<br>

|    Website         |              Url Example                                                              | Required Headers      |
| :------------:     |  :--------------------------:                                                         | :-------:             |
| Amazon Cloudrive   |  https://www.amazon.com/clouddrive/share/media-id                                     |     ‚ùå               |
| AmdaHost           |  https://www.amdahost.com/watch.php?id=media-id                                       |     ‚ùå               |
| Anafast            |  https://anafasts.com/media-id.html / https://anafasts.com:2096/media-id.html         |     ‚ùå               |
| AniStream          |  https://www.ani-stream.com/embed-media-id.html / https://www.ani-stream.com/media-id |     ‚ùå               |
| Archive            |  https://archive.org/embed/media-id                                                   |     ‚ùå               |
| Bitchute           |  https://www.bitchute.com/video/media-id                                              |     ‚ùå               |
| Brighteon          |  https://www.brighteon.com/media-id                                                   |     ‚ùå               |
| Brplayer           |  https://watch.brplayer.site/watch?v=media-id                                         |     Referer          |
| DailyMotion        |  https://www.dailymotion.com/video/media-id                                           |     ‚ùå               |
